abstract: Comedian Amy Schumer holds news conference with her cousin Sen Chuck Schumer to call for new gun control guidelines after gunman fatally shot two women and injured nine others at screening of her film Trainwreck in Lafayette, La.
lead_paragraph: The comedian appeared with the New York senator in Manhattan because of a recent tragedy: A gunman fatally shot two people and injured others at a screening of her film, “Trainwreck,” in Louisiana.

headline.main: Chuck and Amy Schumer Team Up to Fight Gun Violence
headline.print_headline: 2 Schumers Team Up to Fight Gun Violence

snippet: The comedian appeared with the New York senator in Manhattan because of a recent tragedy: A gunman fatally shot two people and injured others at a screening of her film, “Trainwreck,” in Louisiana.
